name: Subsea 7 S.A.
description: Subsea 7 S.A. is a leading global contractor in seabed-to-surface engineering, construction, and services for the offshore energy industry. Established in 2002, the company specializes in complex offshore projects, providing a comprehensive range of services including project management, engineering, and the installation of subsea infrastructure. Subsea 7 operates in various energy sectors, focusing on oil and gas, renewable energy, and decommissioning services. With a strong emphasis on safety and sustainability, Subsea 7 is dedicated to reducing environmental impact while delivering innovative solutions to meet the evolving energy demands of the world. The company’s fleets of specialized vessels and advanced technology enable it to execute projects in the most challenging offshore environments. Subsea 7 aims to support its clients in achieving their objectives through cost-effective and efficient service delivery, while actively contributing to the energy transition with its involvement in offshore wind farm projects and other renewable energy initiatives. The company’s mission is to deliver the highest level of service to its clients while maintaining its commitment to safety, quality, and sustainability, thereby playing a pivotal role in shaping the future of the offshore energy sector.

seo.meta_title: Subsea 7 S.A. | Offshore Engineering and Construction Services
seo.meta_description: Explore Subsea 7 S.A., a global leader in seabed-to-surface engineering and construction for the offshore energy sector. Learn about our services and commitment to sustainability.

faq.question: What services does Subsea 7 provide?
faq.answer: Subsea 7 provides offshore engineering, construction, subsea installation, project management, and renewable energy services.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Subsea 7?
faq.answer: Jean Cahuzac is the CEO of Subsea 7 S.A.

faq.question: Where is Subsea 7 headquartered?
faq.answer: Subsea 7 is headquartered in Luxembourg City, Luxembourg.

faq.question: What sectors does Subsea 7 operate in?
faq.answer: Subsea 7 operates in the oil and gas sector as well as renewable energy, particularly offshore wind.
